comments: CGSC 232 required. Cross listed with PSYC 233.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Concurrent registration in CGSC 232. A grade of C- or better must be earned in both Psychology/Cognitive Science 232 and 233 to satisfy the LS requirement.; Psychology 110 or permission of the instructor. A grade of C- or better must be earned in both Psychology/Cognitive Science 232 and 233 to satisfy the LS requirement.
summary: Students will participate in the replication and planning of empirical studies, collecting and analyzing data relevant to major cognitive phenomena.
title: Laboratory Research Methods in Cognitive Science
